bug.author: leezu
bug.summary: 3rdparty/openmp cmake build broken on some systems
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/17098>#17098</denchmark-link> and please help to review it. cmake -GNinja -DUSE_CUDA=ON will currently fail on some systems, as OpenMP detects and attempts to build nvptx offloading target (which is not needed, but whose build fails).
